<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:14.0pt;

Tahoma;mso-bidi-font-family:Tahoma;color:#343434;mso-font-kerning:0pt">选择</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
微软雅黑;color:#343434;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Delphi</span><span style="font-size:
14.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-ascii-font-family:Tahoma;mso-hansi-font-family:
Tahoma;mso-bidi-font-family:Tahoma;color:#343434;mso-font-kerning:0pt">作为主要的程序设计工具和语言，实际上是非常偶然的。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
微软雅黑;color:#343434;mso-font-kerning:0pt">2000</span><span style="font-size:
14.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-ascii-font-family:Tahoma;mso-hansi-font-family:
Tahoma;mso-bidi-font-family:Tahoma;color:#343434;mso-font-kerning:0pt">年来到北京读博士，那时我只会</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
微软雅黑;color:#343434;mso-font-kerning:0pt">FORTRAN</span><span style="font-size:
14.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-ascii-font-family:Tahoma;mso-hansi-font-family:
Tahoma;mso-bidi-font-family:Tahoma;color:#343434;mso-font-kerning:0pt">语言，但非常羡慕那些可视化的程序设计者，能够将自己的算法研究做成容易推广使用的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
微软雅黑;color:#343434;mso-font-kerning:0pt">“</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-ascii-font-family:Tahoma;mso-hansi-font-family:
Tahoma;mso-bidi-font-family:Tahoma;color:#343434;mso-font-kerning:0pt">软件</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
微软雅黑;color:#343434;mso-font-kerning:0pt">”</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;
